Title: Requires the office of renewable energy siting to develop standards and conditions for the siting of certain large scale renewable energy systems
Summary: Requires the office of renewable energy siting to develop standards and conditions for the siting of certain large scale renewable energy systems; requires approval of municipalities to such siting plans.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring the office of renewable energy siting to develop standards and conditions for the siting of certain large scale renewable energy systems
